work.title: PayB One - Stop Payment Gateway
work.description: A unified payment gateway that connects all major Myanmar digital wallets through one simple API.
work.responsibility: Onboarded new merchants and kept the payment gateway running smoothly through regular maintenance.

work.title: Boss ERP - Multi-Tenant ERP System
work.description: A cloud-based, multi-tenant ERP system that brings all core business operations into one easy-to-manage platform.
work.responsibility: Contributed to system architecture and worked on both frontend and backend development from the early concept stage through launch.

work.title: Myanmar Distribution Group - Digital Campaign
work.description: A digital campaign platform with a customer lucky draw system and an admin portal for managing entries and winners.
work.responsibility: Designed and developed the backend architecture, implemented lucky draw mechanics, and built APIs for the admin portal and campaign.

work.title: Spy Wine Myanmar - Digital Campaign
work.description: A digital campaign platform with a customer lucky draw(daily, weekly, final) system and an admin portal for managing entries and winners.
work.responsibility: Developed both frontend and backend including UI, APIs and campaign logic.

work.title: Suu Buu - Agricultural Marketplace and Funding Platform
work.description: A marketplace and funding platform designed to support Myanmar farmers with better market access and financing.
work.responsibility: Worked across the full development cycle—from idea to launch—building both the frontend and backend.

work.title: 1875 Baydin
work.description: A well-known Myanmar astrology service offering traditional Baydin and horoscope guidance through phone hotlines, digital platforms and payment wallets app like KBZ Pay
work.responsibility: Helped build new features, expand the service to new platforms and keep everything running smoothly.

work.title: OHM - Myanmar Occult & Mystery Content Service
work.description: A mobile content subscription service in Myanmar that delivers exclusive supernatural stories, traditional mantras, and videos through USSD/SMS and a mini app inside a major telecom platform.
work.responsibility: I developed the entire platform and a custom admin portal for easy content and subscription management.

personal.title: Elegance ORM
personal.description: A lightweight cli-based Object Relational Mapping for NodeJs inspired by Laravel Eloquent

personal.title: Myanmar Location Utility
personal.description: A flexible library to manage and manipulate predefined Myanmar location-based data such as Region, Township, Village Tract and Village in an efficient way.

personal.title: Utilizing Prefix and Postfix Evaluation Algorithm in numeric string calculation
personal.description: The core focus is to apply this algorithm to parse and compute complex mathematical expressions.
